title.narrative: Linking Initiatives For the Elimination of Pediatric HIV (LIFE) Program

description.narrative: LIFE project aims to improve the integraion of health services for women and children, strengthen FOT's health systems to increase efficiencies and improve program performance, and ensure a sustainable and locally-owned response.

title.narrative: SO 10: Reduced Transmission and Impact of HIV,AIDS in Tanzania.
Performance evaluation of TUNAJALI II and LIFE comprehensive HIV care activities in Tanzania
